thread.title: James Blake – “My Willing Heart” Video (Feat. Natalie Portman)
thread.title_full: James Blake – “My Willing Heart” Video (Feat. Natalie Portman)

author: James Rettig
title: James Blake – “My Willing Heart” Video (Feat. Natalie Portman)
text:
James Rettig @jmret | 12:49 pm Share < br />this article: 
James Blake has shared a video for his The Colour In Anything track “My Willing Heart.” It stars Natalie Portman, and was shot just a few days before she gave birth last month. She swims underwater and luxuriates in bed in a series of moody black-and-white shots. The video was directed by Anna Rose Holmer. Watch it below. 
The Colour In Anything is out now via Polydor .
